bibl.title: Some Lost Fragments of Hyperides.
bibl.note: Fragments of P. lit. Lond. 132 (= Pack2 1233) have turned up in a collection in the library of St. John's College, Cambridge. Two of the largest were published as Bb II and III by Blass in the Teubner edition of 1869; Blass placed them both in the Oration against Demosthenes. The third appears not to have been published.
bibl.seg: MORGAN Teresa, Some Lost Fragments of Hyperides.
141.4 P. Cambr. St. John's College sans No. d'Inv.
